STOP in line 190

10 (0) REM THIS PROGRAM IS A NAIVE SORT.
100 (1) LET N = 100
102 (1) OPTION MAX_DIM N
110 (1) PRINT "NAIVE SORT"
112 (1) PRINT N; " VALUES"
114 (1) PRINT
120 (1) DIM Z(100)
122 (1) ARR Z = RND1(N, 100)
130 (1) PRINT "ORIGINAL ARRAY:"
132 (1) ARR PRINT Z
134 (1) PRINT
140 (1) GOSUB 200
150 (1) PRINT "SORTED ARRAY:"
152 (1) ARR PRINT Z
154 (1) PRINT
190 (1) STOP
200 G(200) F(I:200) (1) FOR I = 0 TO N - 1
210 G(200) F(I:200,J:210) (100) FOR J = I + 1 TO N
220 G(200) F(I:200,J:210) (5050) IF Z(I) < Z(J) THEN 240
230 G(200) F(I:200,J:210) (2279) LET Z(I), Z(J) = Z(J), Z(I)
240 G(200) F(I:200,J:210) (5050) NEXT J
250 G(200) F(I:200) (100) NEXT I
260 G(200) (1) RETURN
999 (0) END
